review.title: “Now Closed”
review.pros: Pros – A great, family-style complement to "big grey"--small shop with big heart. Good leadership from the top, and definitely cared about the employees.
review.cons: Cons – Didn't get full exposure to big agency, and the senior leadership lacked vision for the company. No focus--youth? entertainment? lifestyle? Identity crisis definitely lead to its downfall.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The agency should have had a clearer point of view, though understand that the changing landscape made it difficult for segment shops (i.e. youth) to compete when so much was going into non-traditional.
